DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate association inflammatory mediator find tear film development follow induction contact lens solution-induced corneal staining .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Tear Film-Based Proteins Associated With Care Solution Induced Corneal Staining
DOC.criteria: For nonlens wearer : Normal eye . Currently wear contact lenses worn contact lenses previous 6 month . Free dry eye use Ocular Surface Disease Index ( Schiffman et al ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . For contact lens wearer : Currently wear soft contact lens . Free dry eye lens wear use Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire ShortForm ( Nichols et al , Cornea , 2002 ) . Reports contact lens wearing time least 12 hour per day , 7 day per week , daily wear basis ( overnight wear ) . Reports occasional use contact lens rewetting drop artificial tear . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . For nonlens wearer contact lens wearer : Pregnant . Participating another research study . Exhibiting stain fluorescein 5 % total cornea ( grade `` extent '' stain across 5 region ) . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
